Aria Steelwind

Steelwind is extremely logical and won’t accept arguments that aren’t supported by evidence. However, she has become secretive lately, and her actions seem to stem from paranoia./n/n She’s uneasy about case elements that relate to Miriam Frega. And she’s very inclined to hide Frega’s involvement from the court at all costs.
Nothing about my behavior has changed.
